LanguageData.Arachne.label: arachne
LanguageData.Arachne.description: Arachne race lineage can be traced back to Arachne homeworld where the temperature fluctuate between cold and warm.\nArachnes over thousands of generations began to adapt to these temperature and ables themselves to withstand cold but in return have less tolerance to the heat
LanguageData.Arachne.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Arachne.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Arachne.tools.2.label: left claw
LanguageData.Arachne.tools.3.label: right claw
